title: Create An Event not working
body:
I'm trying to submit a viewing party I'm preparing for MSI finals :) When I click on any "Organise A" button on the 'events/new' page it won't let me create any events. I've tried on multiple computers and via mobile, I can't make them. My mates can though.

Also whenever I load the events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/new page I get a "An Unknown Error Has Occurred" red dialogue box at the bottom of the screen (picture here https://imgur.com/a/R0Kvuw9 for clarification) if that helps diagnose.

Plz halp, mod mates! <3

replies.body:
Thanks for reporting this. Yours is the second report of this issue I have seen for OCE but there are reports from other regions too.
We're speaking with other teams at Riot to try to get to the bottom of this, but can't guarantee when we'll be able to fix this.

If you have another account I'd recommend trying to create the event with that one. As you mentioned, the issue is currently only occurring for some accounts.

I have exactly the same issue on EUW with this account. I already reported to the support there.
Here is a screenshot:
https://imgur.com/a/oA0bHTq
